#include <stdio.h>
#include <math.h>
#include <string.h>

int main(void) {
	int n;
	scanf("%d",&n);
	while(n--)
	{
		int num,num1,sum,a[3]={2,3,5},i;
		scanf("%d",&num);
		for(i=0;i<3;i++)
		{
			sum=0;num1=num;
			while(num)
			{
				sum+=num/a[i];
				num/=a[i];
			}
			printf("%d\n",sum);num=num1;
		}
	}
	
	return 0;
}
